snippet: The Dublin-based budget airline said that competition in an environment of austerity could limit its income.
abstract: Dublin-based budget airline Ryanair rattles investors with warning that its profit for fiscal year 2013 could fall short of previous forecasts; cites intensifying competition for low-fare passengers; shares tumble 11 percent.
lead_paragraph: The Dublin-based budget airline said that competition in an environment of austerity could limit its income.

headline.main: Ryanair Warns Profit Could Be Short, and Shares Fall
headline.print_headline: Ryanair Warns Profit Could Be Short, and Shares Fall
